name: P30
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A person claiming to be a utility worker in generic work clothes. They walk steadily toward the front door from the edge of frame. Natural walking gait, arms swinging slightly. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 18-second duration.
